content:
Our new daily podcast gives you context and clarity on the stories shaping your world

AS REBEL forces advance on Tripoli and American troops withdraw, we look at the Libyan general leading the march, and at the country’s fractured politics. There is evidence that Facebook’s advertisement algorithms discriminate on the basis of race and gender. But who’s to blame, and what are the remedies? And, the tricky business of making slot machines appeal to a generation of gamers. Runtime: 20 min.

Listen on: Apple Podcasts  |  Spotify  |  Google  |  Stitcher  |  TuneIn

ex: n. 反政府的人；叛乱者；造反者；反抗权威者
v. 造反；反抗；背叛
adj. 造反的
网络 反叛；反叛者；叛逆者
eg2: rebel forces
叛乱武装
Armed rebels advanced towards the capital.
武装叛乱分子向首都推进。
I've always been the rebel of the family.
我在家里向来是个叛逆者。
He later rebelled against his strict religious upbringing.
他后来背叛了他所受的严格的宗教教育。
Most teenagers find something to rebel against.
大多数青少年都有反抗意识。

ex: n. 反政府的人；叛乱者；造反者；反抗权威者
v. 造反；反抗；背叛
adj. 造反的

eg2: rebel forces
叛乱武装
Armed rebels advanced towards the capital.
武装叛乱分子向首都推进。
I've always been the rebel of the family.
我在家里向来是个叛逆者。
He later rebelled against his strict religious upbringing.
他后来背叛了他所受的严格的宗教教育。
Most teenagers find something to rebel against.
大多数青少年都有反抗意识。

ex: n. 执行时间，运行时间

wp.Reports Runtime: 不指定报表名而打开;报表运行器

ex: n. 〔机〕缝针；拼逢机；钉箱机；齿形压滚
网络 带材缝合机；钉书机；订书机
n. 【城】的黎波里；【矿】风化硅石
网络 首都的黎波里；利比亚首都的黎波里；特里波利
n. 算法；计算程序
网络 演算法；运算法则；规则系统
n. 男低音；男低音歌手；鲈（包括多种食用海鱼和淡水鱼）
adj. 低音的；低声调的
网络 贝斯；贝司；鲈鱼

wp.discriminate validity: 别效度;区分效度;区别效度;区别有效性

ex: vt. 歧视；区别；辨别
vi. 区别；辨别
eg2: I can discriminate right from wrong.
我能辨别是非。
She can't discriminate right from wrong.
她不能辨别是非。
The child can discriminate one thing from another.
这孩子能把一事物与另一事物区别开来。

ex: adj. 有辨识力的；差别对待的

wp.discriminatory pricing: 差别定价;歧视性定价;定价法;歧视定价
wp.discriminatory auction: 别拍卖;复数价格标;歧视性价格拍卖
wp.discriminatory carrier: 识别载波;		判别载波
wp.discriminatory practices: 歧视性惯例;歧视性的做法

eg2: Firms should be in no doubt that it is  and we will not accept it.
在毫无疑问，这样的公司应该是歧视性的，我们不会接受它。
That situation has long been a focus of criticism by gay rights groups, who argue that the law is particularly  against immigrants.
这一现状是同性恋权益组织长久以来批判的焦点，他们认为这一法规是针对移民的区别对待。
But nor would anyone pretend that the discriminatory policies which gave rise to such horrors have disappeared from modern France.
但也不会有任何人假装引起了这样的恐怖事件的歧视性政策已在当代法国消失。

ex: n. 断裂；裂缝；【医学】挫伤；【矿物】断口
v. (使)破裂；(使)折断；(使)断裂；使破坏
网络 骨折；破绽；破碎
eg2: a fracture of the leg/skull
腿骨╱颅骨骨折
a compound/simple fracture(= one in which the broken bone comes/does not come through the skin)
复合（开放）骨折；单纯（闭合）骨折
Old people's bones are more prone to fracture.
老人更易骨折。
His leg fractured in two places.
他的一条腿有两处骨折。
She fell and fractured her skull.
她跌倒摔裂了颅骨。
a fractured pipeline
破裂的管道
Many people predicted that the party would fracture and split.
很多人预言该党将分崩离析。
The company was fractured into several smaller groups.
这家公司被拆分成几家小公司。

ex: n. 处理方法；改进措施；补偿；疗法
v. 改正；纠正；改进
网络 补救；治疗；药物
eg2: There is no simple remedy for unemployment.
失业问题没有简单的解决办法。
There are a number of possible remedies to this problem.
这个问题有许多可能采取的解决办法。
a herbal remedy
草药
an excellent home remedy for sore throats
治疗咽喉疼痛的极佳的家庭疗法
Holding copyright provides the only legal remedy against unauthorized copying.
持有版权是制止盗版的唯一法律手段。
to remedy a problem
解决问题
This situation is easily remedied.
这种情形易于补救。

ex: n. 机会；（投放或插入东西的）窄缝
v. 投放；插入；（被）塞进；（被）装入
网络 槽；插槽；狭槽
eg2: to put some coins in the slot
往投币口中塞几个硬币
He has a regular slot on the late-night programme.
他在深夜节目中有一档固定栏目。
Their album has occupied the Number One slot for the past six weeks.
他们的唱片在最近六周占据排行榜首位。
the airport's take-off and landing slots
机场的起飞降落时间表
He slotted a cassette into the VCR.
他把录像带插入录像机中。
The bed comes in sections which can be quickly slotted together .
这种床以散件出售，可以快速组装起来。
The dishwasher slots neatly between the cupboards.
洗碗机刚好可以放在两个碗橱之间。

wp.Tricky Mischief: 诡计;赤壁;诡计赤壁;电影原声带
wp.Nothing tricky: 别耍花招;不准耍花招;别耍把戏
wp.Tricky Towers: 难死塔;超欢乐俄罗斯方块大战

ex: adj. 狡猾的；机警的；棘手的
eg2: The  street pedlar cheated the girl into giving him all her money.
狡猾的摊贩把小姑娘的钱全骗走了。
But have no fear, there is no risk of collision, at least for the next century or so (forecasting much beyond that is ).
但是至少到下个世纪为止无需担心有碰撞的危险（也没有预报的那么棘手）。

wp.Withdraw Request: 撤回要求;取款请求;撤回请求
wp.Withdraw money: 取钱;提款;提钱;提取现金

ex: vt. 撤退；收回；撤消；拉开
vi. 撤退；离开
eg2: The leader promised to support the plan;you can't  now.
领导已答应支持这项计划，你们不能收回承诺。
Sometimes this will make us , but it can also motivate us to shift our attention or change our learning strategy, he says.
有时困惑会使我们撤退，但它也能激励我们转移注意力或者改变我们的学习策略，他如是说道。
When workers retire, they can withdraw money from the plan.
当工人们退休了，他们能从计划中收回金钱。

Title: Rebels march on Tripoli, Facebook’s discriminatory algorithms and slot machines get game
